website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers Relment Pelmo can be considered a mid-performing boot given the reported pros and cons. The comfort and selling price are its prime advantages. It was also liked because of its warmth and waterproofing. Nevertheless, the noted setbacks give interested buyers something to think about. All in all, future owners of the Relment Pelmo from Skechers should contemplate if this is the right boot for them.
pros: Based on a considerable number of consumer reviews, the Skechers Relment Pelmo was a comfortable boot for hiking
This budget-friendly trail boot pleased more than a handful
The versatility of this gear was applauded by numerous buyers
A large percentage of verified purchasers were stoked with its true-to-width fit
Several owners appreciated the excellent cushioning from the boot’s insole
Many outdoorsmen discovered that it was a satisfyingly watertight trail hiker
The warmth of the Relment Pelmo made it a good pair of boots for cold-weather hikes, as said by plenty of wearers
cons: Some individuals commented that the Skechers men’s Relment Pelmo hiking boot was heavy
The break-in period of this trail hiker displeased a handful
A couple of wearers were not happy when the boot’s lacing hardware broke too soon
The shaft at the ankle was too stiff for a few

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Never been a walking boot wearer so took a risk on these and bygod am I happy with them, super comfortable, wide fit which is great for my big feet, look good and fashionable, good level of waterproofing for rain but not tested them in extreme wet conditions. Just a pleasure to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wait... WHAT???
customer_reviews.text: I would have given these boots 5 starts if I’d reviewed them earlier, but I’m glad I didn’t rush. I find it hard to believe these are amongst the most expensive walking boots I’ve ever bought and yet they have the cheapest laces I’ve ever tied. The laces have shed their skin after only 3 months of ownership - yes you heard that right; 3 MONTHS and the fancy pants, two-tone laces have peeled. I’ve worn CHEAP WORK BOOTS with better quality laces than these ...and it’s not that I draw them too tight, as I can’t abide over-tightened footwear. What were they thinking?
customer_reviews.author: Strawbis

customer_reviews.title: Memory foam sole comfort bliss
customer_reviews.text: Use them for work as an hgv driver and for walking dog at home. First broad boot I have bought and my goodness what a revelation to have instant comfort without having to break the boots in. Memory foam sole is bliss and boots are very supportive around the ankle for walking. They look good too. Interested to see how long they last, but initially it’s looking very good. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: NeilC

customer_reviews.title: Big but still ok.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and look ok ,I normally wear a size 8 but these feel slightly bigger so if I was to order them again I would have a 7.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Lovely looking, but not as comfortable as expected
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these, was going to take them trekking to South America but just not comfortable enough (my mountain warehouse hiking boots win hands down. However still love them. Did buy too large and as a female buying men's boots this could be the reason. Will still wear them, but for best, rather than hiking Machu Pichu!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: not as comfortable as Skechers shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am size 81/2 wide and the boots fit well. They are well made and look as though they will be durable. However they do not have the Skechers 'walking on moss' feel - they feel like a normal walking boot. I have a pair of Skechers shoes which are very comfortable and which I wear all the time, the boots do not feel the same as the shoes. Still they are good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: malkiel

customer_reviews.title: Short lived.
customer_reviews.text: They were great for 7 weeks and then one of the eyelets suddenly let go so lacing them neatly up is now impossible It could just be a one off problem with mine rather than shoddy workmanship. Either way the returns window closed 3 weeks ago so now I’m stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: Nyk Lambert

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: I’m a lady with wide feet, had to return dozens of shoes, as too small. However I find these very roomy, and with thermal socks feel like they’re sliding slighty. However thicker socks sort this. Feet feel warmer with memory foam soles. Very comfortable when walking all day.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Not even a bit waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These boots are sold as waterproof and they are not. Second time on and walking through wet grass in light rain and I could wring the water out of my socks when I got home. The company gave a prompt refund and the boots were very comfortable. I just can’t see the point of having walking boots that let in so much water or of advertising boots as waterproof that are not.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfy as expected but what really lets the ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfy as expected but what really lets the boot down is when they have been wet and you leave them to dry naturally they have white stain marks left on them which will not clean off .
customer_reviews.author: Fishy04

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy straight from the box, definitely waterproof, maybe buy 1/2 size down but size allows for very thick walking socks. Fantastic value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M.

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable walking boots
customer_reviews.text: this is my second pair of the same type of shoes the first pair lasted for ca 8 months or 4000 km (2500mi) and 3 pair of shoelaces. The comfortable fit makes up with the relatively short lifetime. The shoes remained waterproof for quite a while , but once the place with the most vigorous movements -the upper material near the ball- was broken they started to leak, still much later than many other boots I was wearing in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Gatekeeper

customer_reviews.title: Good boots for soggy season
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of boots waterproof as described , breathable debateable as they do make my feet sweat. Overall a good buy especially at the price and used every day for walking the dog in the French countryside
customer_reviews.author: ursula carr

customer_reviews.title: Good walking boots
customer_reviews.text: These are very good boots and very comfortable. Still waiting to test the waterproofing. I have had other sketcher shoes but haven't been impressed. If you like walking you will like these.
customer_reviews.author: Prometheus

customer_reviews.title: Good walking boot
customer_reviews.text: Good walking boot very light weight at a good price. Caught my ankles slightly at first but got more comfortable the more I walked
customer_reviews.author: Keith J

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove.
customer_reviews.text: When you purchase on line it is always difficult, in this case the week before I purchased some Sketches training shoes (very happy) so I purchased these boots, from out of the box they fit like a glove, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yamitori

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable. I am female and take a 7 and have wide feet thats why I purchased a mens boot. They are slightly too big but two pairs of socks sorts it out.
customer_reviews.author: jan crozier

customer_reviews.title: Skecher comfort
customer_reviews.text: Fast service. Boots fit comfortably from day one. They are a wide fit and sketcher comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Skechers relmont pelmo
customer_reviews.text: These boots were for my son..hes very fussy and at first wanted combat boots which were 180.00 !. I persuaded him to try them and recieved a text saying they were so comfortable and well made.i knew skechers were great cos theyre the only boots i will wear..i hope the quality continues..amazing price competes and betters with brands costing twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Both boots failed in the same place after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Both boots failed in the same place after 6 months of normal use. This led to water ingress into the boots and makes them unwearable. Obviously a product fault and am seeking a refund.
customer_reviews.author: G. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof boots
customer_reviews.text: Great winter boots for dog walking on the beach, cliff paths, through wet grass and streams etc. warm and excellent as they’re waterproof in totally wet conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and quality and so far no signs of ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and quality and so far no signs of them being anything but reasonably waterproof - at least after the first 20+ miles. Replaced some much more expensive Berghaus boots and much happier with these.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Quite good
customer_reviews.text: A good shoe, pro where you would expect cons my feet get hot in them and they are very narrow
customer_reviews.author: Shakira

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Good quality pair of boots. I find the waterproof and very comfortable. Fairly wide fitting that suits me. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: D. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are my 2nd pair - the first lasted a year - the 2nd - the stiching has come undone after 10 days use.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Strong & lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These boots feel sturdy but are still comfortable & light to wear. I've had them on through the recent snow & felt very safe on the slippery surfaces. I had seen them in a store at a much higher price even in the sale, so thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots so comfy to wear feel like im walking on clouds
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Godwin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic walking boots fit perfectly look great, waterproof and so comfy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic walking boots fit perfectly look great, waterproof and so comfy
customer_reviews.author: Mr M McGlynn

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and really comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: the padding around the ankle bone is great, other boots rub on my protruding ankle bone.
customer_reviews.author: peter shannon

customer_reviews.title: I take an eight and a half size and there eight and a half size fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy straight from the box I were my boots all day every day I wish I had got them sooner
customer_reviews.author: Steven H McGloine

customer_reviews.title: Another good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: As with my other Sketchers, comfort perfect fit and style .
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit feel and looks. Never had boots as comfortable from the start.
customer_reviews.author: S. K. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Fit your size perfect, but if you want to wear thick socks I recommend going up half a size, well made, Look great on too 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good fit, light
customer_reviews.text: Size 13, good fit, light,didnt rub at all , memory foam inside very comfy. Laces could have been a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: shef

customer_reviews.title: Comfotable and excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy boots, well made, and comfortable. Really pleased with them
customer_reviews.author: r0b29

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable boots
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable even on Long walks. Really happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: mazcordo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for work and ideal for men with arch problems
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and very nice looking boot I’m very happy with these boots
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Ene

customer_reviews.title: Seller good. Courier bad. Product bad.
customer_reviews.text: Soles are incredibly slippery in wet weather. Beware any damp areas or leaves. Seller was good. UK courier was shocking.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kolle

customer_reviews.title: Product exactly as described, free delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great price, value for money. Walking boots perfect for all terains
customer_reviews.author: Sanjam

customer_reviews.title: At last a boot that's comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boot well up to Skechers standard. Comfortable fit & hard wearing. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S M Davies

customer_reviews.title: New shoes
customer_reviews.text: i love them... i use them to work and they are great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not bye online again or check your size in a store first before you order
customer_reviews.text: The shoe size I ordard felt half size too small
customer_reviews.author: liam byrne

customer_reviews.title: When choosing size go one higher.
customer_reviews.text: Became uncomfortable after a period when walking around the house, mainly around the ankles .
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: They aren't waterproof/don't wear them in the rain
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfy but when it rains they let water in. So really disappointed with them as they stated waterproof
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect, light, daily use, warm, coffee,what can I say it’s just perfect
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband, he is very pleased with them. Very comfy, great fit.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Fit true to size. Comfortable out of the box. The soles have a good grip.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Huntergreen

customer_reviews.title: Great boots.
customer_reviews.text: Used for work and leisure. Arrived on time and as advertised. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Aukett

customer_reviews.title: Stitching coming apart
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but stitching already coming apart after 3 months
customer_reviews.author: T Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Not worn in wet conditions yet so cannot comment on waterproofing.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA A.

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Relment-Pelmo High Rise Hiking Boots
product_meta.description: These Relment - Pelmo boots from Skechers feature waterproof smooth durable sport suede upper along with lightly textured durable synthetic overlays at toe and heel. Lace up ankle height comfort hiking style boots with stitching and overlay accents. Memory foam insole. These boots also feature mesh fabric collar and lace area detail for cooling effect and lace up front with metal rings and top hooks. Flexible rubber high traction lug patterned outsole. Keep going in any condition with comfort and rugged style in these Skechers relaxed fit®: Relment - Pelmo boots.
